pageProduct.name: Avene SPF 50+ Sunscreen Spray 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avene Sunscreen Spray SPF 50+ is a very high protection and water resistant sunscreen for face and body which has been formulated with a minimum of chemical filters to respect sensitive skin. It covers a broad spectrum UVB-UVA protection by using an exclusive combination of active ingredients. Its non-greasy texture is quickly absorbed by the skin for even and invisible protection. Its convenient 200ml spray bottle makes it very easy to apply.
Avene Sunscreen Spray SPF 50+ can help prevent solar keratosis, sunspots and premature skin ageing. It also may assist in preventing some skin cancers.
Avene Sunscreen Spray SPF 50+ benefits from the exclusive SunSitive® Protection formula, result of Pierre Fabre Group’s Research:
- Photoprotective system: works in synergy to offer a formulation with a minimum of chemical filters.
- Pre-tocopheryl: formulated with a photostable Vitamin E precursor.
- Very rich in Avene Thermal Spring Water.
Paraben free, Avene Sunscreen Spray SPF 50+ is hypoallergenic and non-comedogenic.

Ingredients

Avene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua). Octocrylene. Glycerin. C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate.  Water (Aqua). Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol [Nano]. Titanium Dioxyde. Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane.  Diisopropyl Adipate. Dicaprylyl Ether.  Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine.  Cetearyl Isononanoate. Cyclopentasiloxane. Lauryl Glucoside. Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate. Cyclohexasiloxane. Dimethicone.Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride. Caprylyl Glycol. Citric Acid. Decyl Glucoside. Disodium Edta. Fragrance (Parfum). Propylene Glycol. Silica. Sorbic Acid. Tocopherol.Tocopheryl Glucoside. Xanthan Gum.

Directions

Spray generously and spread evenly by hand over all exposed areas 20 minutes prior to sun exposure. Hold container 4 to 6 cm from the skin to apply. Do not spray directly onto face. Reapply after:
- 40 minutes of swimming or sweating
- Immediately after towel drying
- At least every 2 hours
Storage conditions: store below 30C.
